You guys still have Vernon Wells and Tori Hunter. Just Imagine if you re-signed Chone Figgins as well...This is why I can't hand the west to you guys with all your dead weight and the Rangers breathing down your back. Not to mention possible promo money from the number 2 market? I hate St.Louis more than you guys and your in Cleveland's League. They are so smug with their "most W.S." in the N.L. Big deal. Hot, Crime ridden, big gross Midwestern Girls. They think they are the N.L Yankees let's see this year. Good luck over all except when playing the Tribe. I only really don't like Texas in your division. So obviously last years world series was painful to watch. Rally monkey over interrupting squirrel any day!
